thread.title: Billionaire Hedge-Fund Trader Alan Howard Profits in Market Turmoil

author: Laurence Fletcher
title: Billionaire Hedge-Fund Trader Alan Howard Profits in Market Turmoil
text:
A secretive hedge fund personally managed by billionaire trader Alan Howard has made a substantial profit from market turbulence at the start of this year, as his firm tries to rebuild from years of investor withdrawals and sluggish performance.
The AH fund, launched last year and holding a sizable personal investment from Mr. Howard, gained around 7% this year through February, said a person familiar with the matter. That ranks as one of the industryâ€™s best gains so far for 2018, according to numbers compiled by The Wall...
